Class RandomizationAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • FitnessFunction
      • RandomizationAlgorithm

  • public class RandomizationAlgorithm
extends FitnessFunction
    This class uses the fitness function to evaluate the chromosomes with randomization processes like random-walk. Also, it writes iterations of improved chromosomes into a file with ending on best chromosome iteration. This class also extends FitnessFunction class for using fitness function, lower and upper bounds plus dimensions specified in it.
    Since:
    07-02-2018
    See Also:
    FitnessFunction

    • Method Detail

      • genChromosome

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> genChromosome()
        This method creates a deepcopy i.e. a seperate copy of chromosome that will not be side effected by originals manipulation. A seperate copy of the object is created with same values as copyFrom parameter.
        Returns:
        ArrayList This is the newly generated double value containing chromosome which is returned
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Individual

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method is used for randomly generating chromosome and comparing with the best-fitness. Storing the most fit chromosome with value until the termination criteria is reached.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - This exception is throwned while accessing null list/FileWriterObject.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Individual, FitnessFunction, FileWriter
